posts.name: Vue.js
posts.text: Vue.js is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It is designed from the ground up to be incrementally adoptable, and can easily scale between a library and a framework depending on different use cases. It is also capable of powering sophisticated single-page applications when used in combination with modern tooling and supporting libraries. posts.author: Evan You
